  • Constructor Details

    • MatchManager

      public MatchManager​(int id, IntermediaryClass intermediaryClass)
      starts with only the first player who is also the creator of the match
      Parameters:
      id - is id of match used for multiple matches
      intermediaryClass - is the class that connects all two/three clientHandlers together and helps with implementation of certain important methods

    • MatchManager

      public MatchManager​(int id, IntermediaryClass intermediaryClass, int x)

  • Method Details

    • getMatch

      public Match getMatch()

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • setupPlayers

      public void setupPlayers​(int godToChoose)
      connect the players (2 or 3) and give a god to each of them
      Parameters:
      godToChoose - is used for tests, in which if godToChoose is equal to -1 it will choose a random god (set by default for normal games) otherwise we can change it to a value from 0 to 14 to choose one god we decide.

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      each player puts his own invisible blocks on the game board if his god foresees it, and sets his workers

    • turn

      public void turn()
      each player moves a worker and builds. If he cannot do this with none of his workers he loses, if he is the last remained player, he wins

    • giveGods

      public void giveGods()
      give randomly a god to each player

    • giveGods

      public void giveGods​(int id)

    • giveVictory

      public void giveVictory​(PlayerManager playerManager)
